subject: Order-SSN1937 calibration issue
description_text:
Hi.

I am able to calibrate my pedals in the simsonn manager, however when I go
into games to assign the pedals there is an extra channel. This extra
channel is axis 4 in some games or x rotation in control panel. This
channel is flickering and makes it impossible to assign the pedals in game
or even get into some games. I have attached a picture  and clip of said
problem. I am willing to trouble shoot this to get these working properly.
However if this can't be resolved I will need to return them.

Awaiting your response.

Kind regards.

Matt

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt Bromley,     Please update to version 2.0.9 for the latest features and improved compatibility.   In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.

Pics of issue.

On Sun, 20 July 2025, 3:28 pm service@simsonn.com,

Thank you this is very helpful and has resolved my issue.

On Sun, 20 July 2025, 3:28 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Matt Bromley,    Thank you for your prompt feedback and feel free to contact us if you have any other questions. Have fun!
